title: Balance team is buffing TOO MUCH
body:
I can't even understand what's happening at Riot's HQ

back in the old days, Morello used to buff 3 champions and nerf 10 of them every patch
this was already discussed years ago in this old thread http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=4320431&page=1

to which CertainlyT answered by (basically) "we nerf as much as we buff"
https://i.gyazo.com/c0def0947103c7da05caac89cd8a0fa1.png

but HERE IS THE PROBLEM, when you look at today's patch you get this :
https://i.gyazo.com/b1b7a28552e61120395aedca3b37e91a.png

can you look at this, and say "we're buffing as much as nerfing?"

you get x3 more champions buffed than before, and way more than champion's nerf

why is {{champion:53}}  getting a range buff on his hook, when {{champion:555}}  is a better blitzcrank?

the thing is that when you look at every patch, you read **complete non sense** you try to understand if Riot understands the concept of "balanced around".

Blitzcrank was balanced around 1050 range hook **for 9 years straight**, it never changed why is it being changed now just because pyke has been released? **STOP POWERCREEPING YOUR GAME**

Fiora Q can hit towers now? This is the perfect example of riot not knowing that they're powercreeping their game over and over again, you're changing mechanics and numbers that remained untouched for so long, because your new champions {{champion:555}} {{champion:350}} {{champion:517}}  are being released with absurd mechanics.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Pyke just needs a punish game, thats it. The fact his passive is active under the effects of ignite is dumb (as a person who played top Pyke mainly for fun until they removed it from the game). His ult is also dumb just for the gold alone. The execute is fine when the kit is balanced out, but the problem is that his ult gold scales with bounty, so you can easily net 300+ gold on every ult. I had a suggestion that the gold should scale with rank (100 rank 1, 200 rank 2, 300 rank 3), but I also had another idea just now: **Why not have the kill gold get split 50/50?**
Removes the need of having two Your Cuts needed for assists on Pyke, but also lowers the snowball potential of the Pyke lane by having the gold get split even.

> Pyke needs to be nerfed, and HARD NERFED

What left to nerf? Q is now single target, E doesnt damage minions. whats next R cant execute? Pykes a champion you play around and takes some lobby coordination and good laning. fail at that and too bad, thats for every champ. This is just another example of Riot falling behind their own words and limiting a champion to one position ONLY. There's rarely any versatility in this game when it comes to roles.

And i know "what about sona tahm or garen yuumi? only pros do that (or koreans) and yuumi cause yuumi.
But blitz rangebuff might be fun in lower elo . Lets hook from tower 2 tower :3
both things need to happen, blitz only is good because people are bad. go in super high elo and blitz's relevance is gone

If Blitzcrank is good in lower elo, then that is their philosophy fulfilled. He really really does not need a buff and especially not one that's going to exacerbate the problems low elo(where over 90% of the player base is) have with him.

Ghostcrawler with meddler under him then meddler up and repertoir after then repertoir up and the other guy. Now this yetter dude or w/e his name. Really just get external people with fresh minds fresh ideas with a different outlook on the game what is happening right now is atrocious.

You're forgetting that this is the time of year where Riot decides to try to buff more champions to add in more variety for the coming Worlds patches.

https://images-ext-2.discordapp.net/external/SA3Po26-913gGNah-MIrchU7FHWJYMviSE-GIdQK-1U/https/pbs.twimg.com/media/EDQMlpAXoAAEpD-.jpg%3Alarge

compare this to the old times when you had x2 more nerfs than buffs

In return sending Aatrox into the gutter for the second time this year, because who would have known that putting all of his damage on one ability was a good idea. Maybe they should have done the right thing and gave him a W that relates to auto attacking instead of a petty set up tool that only works on immobile champs. W should become a 2 or 3 part auto attack ability.

Balancing is easy brother. 
Every ability now hits turrets. 
Stealth on specific champions is gone due to player frustration, ALL champions now gain true stealth for 15 seconds at random points in the game (about 5 procs per minute on average, the math checks out dont worry)

Dashes and skillshots are global, Point and clicks are about the range of a Pantheon ult.
To compensate for every single ability working on turrets, turrets now have 50 layers of plating. (Dont worry, to balance it out each plate is only worth 140 gold instead of 150)

The CDR cap is increased to 80%, because everyone loved urf so much. Items with CDR have their cdr values doubled.

Choosing runes is hard, we know. So now you get every single runes all at once, think of the wacky, zany possibilities!

Removed several underplayed champions because T̶h̶e̶y̶ ̶d̶o̶n̶t̶ ̶s̶e̶l̶l̶ ̶s̶k̶i̶n̶s̶ Are unpopular. (think {{champion:516}} {{champion:83}}  etc, their fanbase can now move on to popular weeb champs like lux and kai'sa and join the fold.)

Also, if we dare going into the details of the changes, they're buffing once again Vayne's ultimate AD steroid.

This means that they refuse to learn from the very mistakes they acknowledged.

When the AD steroid of Vayne gets buffed, she becomes an assassin carry 3 hitting everything. That's not the first time the AD steroid gets buffed, every time with the same result: Vayne stacks on-hit burst and crit, and her counterplay disappears. 

You might argue that any counterplay Vayne had was gone with the insane "50% crd on Q during ult " buff for her Chinese-appealing pReSTiGe skin, and that would be an argument as fair as sad.

Yeah, until I read the bottom of your comment I was about to mention that.

Her counterplay, which was already very limited , was removed entirely when they gave her near permanent stealth during ult.

Old balance was great. Super strong and super weak champs were considered outliers. By this logic, S tier and S+ tier weren't allowed to exist for very long. Everything got nerfed in consideration with how much it was outperforming its supposed counters, and then nerfed again maybe, based on how it was outperforming champions with similar jobs. Everything got nerfed down to A or B tier, C tiers were actually still pretty decent picks if you were good with them or had a situation against their comp that made them good, and D tiers tended to get overlooked in this system, but that's fair since most of them were balance nightmares by kit design alone. Even champions in healthy spots were nerfed if they were only in the healthy spot because the numbers let them bully a counter.

Now D Tiers are actually just champions that don't sell skins, some of which just happen to be balance nightmares. Balance nightmares via kit design are allowed to be S or S+, provided they sell skins. A and B tier champions sit there until they sell more skins, where they're buffed to S tier, or rarely nerfed a tier due to public outcry. It's fucking pathetic. There's no way Riot doesn't see how much better the old balancing system was for the game. They just don't care.

I've said this many times, and idk how many more times I need to say it: They need people who play the game that isn't of Riot Origin to be on the balance team. 

Top and Jg time and time again get shafted in the butt because the views haven't changed. Before this buff list came out, the Kai Sa nerf kinda confirmed things for me, when paired with the Aatrox nerf: They geniunely dont give a damn about Top and Jg, but give many fucks about ADC, but still refuse to nerf a hyperscaler the right way. 

Aatrox proved to be a threat for top to deal with ADCs, and now they've removed it, leaving Morde (subpar) and Panth to struggle as a replacement. Put Dom on the balance team, or Loco, or even Hash. Just someone who plays the game for the love of god.
How the fuck does someone get 5 upvotes for suggesting Hashinshin be on the balance team. These boards really are delusional.
Because I said anyone who plays the game should be on the team. I didn't say, "Just add Hash to fix the game". Trust me, I know he has issues of his own that wouldn't fit well.

At least thats how i read the "notes"
At least they didnt buff ryze...oh boy am i tired of seeing that champ in pr0 play...GEEEEEEEEEEESUS

Well to be fair, orianna has struggled to be viable for years now and it's about time we see her being played again too. I still don't actually think this is enough of a buff to make that happen. She doesn't fit the meta unless it changes by worlds.

What about the other 130 champs we never see in pr0 play ? don't they deserve some love as well ?
I do think the nerf to tahm is a bit meh, he didnt deserve that.
Tahm has a great ult that can create fun and interesting plays in pr0 matches, i for one will miss that.

The problem with Orianna is the same as the one with Ryze, just worse. Her kit is always borderline perfect for progames, but she sucks in solo Queue (99% of players are not Faker and will never be Faker). If you bring her base stats high enough for her to do well in solo then she instantly becomes 100% pick/ban midlane in every progame in any team comp.

If you look at kits in the past and compare them to now, you can really see.

Gangplank in the past was viable, if a little bad, and was the same champion, with a bit of AD from an ability, and without the barrels. Ya know, his main source of fucking damage?

Veigar had a single target Q with like half the range, no W cdr, no stacking besides on Q unit kills, no execute on ult, and he was balanced, and even considered quite strong at one point before his rework.

I think the easiest way to see it is in fiddlesticks.

His W used to be a complete fight winner. You would ***outheal*** other junglers entirely unless they stunned you immediately.

Now you just stand there T-posing for 1.5 seconds before your fear ends and Xin Zhao kills you in 3 autos.

God, I miss fiddlesticks...
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
Greedy bastards buffing Riven just for a new skin coming out...

Give the game 10 years.
In 10 years, the only way for a champion to qualify to be part of the meta is going to have a toxic and/or unreasonable mechanic. There's one more adjective I forgot, but it doesn't matter.
At one point, when we get like 30-40 champions with ridiculous abilities like {{champion:82}} R, every reasonable champion is going to be out of meta forever, at least until a rework.

As a Cass casual user, i was expecting a nerf instead of a buff. Oh well.

About the fiora change: beware Fiora users, do not attempt to dive an enemy champion. You will certainly regret it, if my fear is correct, that is.
It would obviously prioritize a champion if one is in range and if there isn't, at least she gets her q on a lower cd than before because of it.
Trying to give credit to Riot's balance and coding teams is a fool's errand.
I'm not trying to give credit. That's just how abilities have worked before so why not now too? Don't be a blind hater.
No leadership, no direction... this game is continuing to go downhill.

Yeah, this Worlds is probably going to be really awful with these changes. Can't even imagine what will happen to soloq as well. There's only one way to not be surprised by Riot at this point: keep your expectations as low as they can possibly be. That way you have lower chances of being surprised.


P.S. I said lower. You will probably still be surprised quite often.
